text:
Esperanza GÃ³mez is hospitalized and fans worry about her health
The Colombian porn actress shared a photograph from the clinic through her Instagram account, where she has more than 4 million and a half followers.

07 Nov 2019, 10:24

"All day under observation, but do not miss the recovery ...", was the simple message that Gomez wrote in the aforementioned publication that already has more than 106 thousand "likes."
In the image you can see that the renowned porn actress is lying on the stretcher of a hospital and, apparently, she was channeled through a venous route.
Esperanza GÃ³mez's publication has worried her millions of followers, and although the actress did not reveal the reason for her hospitalization, they have left messages of encouragement for her to recover soon.
"Prompt recovery and that you get better", "What do you want to help her in her recovery", "What happened to her, Princess?", "Beautiful, I hope you get better", "All good, whatever you are offered heart, greetings â€, Were some of the comments left in the photograph.

Next, the photograph of the porn actress in the hospital, where she doesn't look so bad looking:






Messages to Esperanza GÃ³mez / Instagram @esperanzagomez
